law.catch_line: In this Part IV of this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this Part IV of this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Actual address" means a residential street address, school address, or work address of an individual, as specified on the individual's application to be a Program participant under this part.
"Disabled person" has the meaning stated in § 13-101 of the Estates and Trusts Article.
"Program participant" means a person designated as a Program participant under this part.
